description:
Neesha is one of four Pokémon Trainers who managed to brave Mewtwo`s storm to get to New Island by riding her Dewgong.
Dewgong is a Pokémon that Neesha took to New Island after Neesha was invited to meet the "World`s Greatest Pokémon Trainer".
Mewtwo captured Dewgong and made a clone of it for himself.
name: Jugon (Sweet)
